storyInfo: 'Lemuen forgave you. Mostima forgave you. Yvangelista XI forgave you. Even if all of Laterano forgives you... I will not.'

attributes.text: It was a small Iberian town, one that you can't even find on a map or in history books.
When people still lived there, it was called Rocamarea.
The Bishop of Rocamarea raised a young Sankta. A Sankta... growing up here, learning here, and enjoying life to the fullest.
This was a humble and barren place, but well suited for the asceticism of a pious life.
Except after the Profound Silence, life in Iberia was always fragile, no matter how hard people worked.
One plague, one famine, or one premeditated infiltration was all it took to bring everything crashing down.
To save the hometown that, at the same time, was not his hometown, the Sankta arrived in the holy city of Laterano to ask for any amount of support.
The answer he received was simple: You are one of us, but they are not.
When the Sankta returned to Iberia, that 'hometown' had disappeared.
Everything had been completely smoothed over, erased, as if it never existed at all.
Like a grain of sand disappearing into the desert, or a drop of water dissolving into the tide.
After a long journey, the Sankta returned to Laterano an emaciated, lost soul.
He went to the chapel to seek a canonized bishop, in search of answers or guidance.
But even the canonist could only remain silent in the face of such great doubt.
On the pew he sat, remaining there from dawn to dusk.
Fiammetta, that was the first time I met Andoain.

attributes.content: Sigh...
attributes.name: The Pope

attributes.content: Forget it, I'll pay for it myself. The repairs here cost too much.
attributes.name: The Pope

attributes.content: We'll just have to cut back on the afternoon tea and sweets.
attributes.name: The Pope

attributes.content: Your Holiness! I heard the sound of fighting coming from the Basilica! Are you alright?
attributes.name: Apostolic Knight

attributes.content: What... You were attacked by heretics?! I'm sorry! I failed in my duties!
attributes.name: Apostolic Knight

attributes.content: Fret not, Paolario. Did you forget who won the Basilica's last arm wrestling tournament?
attributes.name: The Pope

attributes.content: You did.
attributes.name: Apostolic Knight

attributes.content: I was just exercising my wrist a bit, and ended up causing a bit of an accident.
attributes.name: The Pope

attributes.content: The unrest within the city has already subsided.
attributes.name: The Pope

attributes.content: Yes, they've dispersed. I didn't even get a chance to grill––
attributes.name: Apostolic Knight

attributes.content: Excuse me, can I come in?
Ahem, my apologies. Your Holiness, I'm making a fool of myself.
attributes.name: Apostolic Knight

attributes.content: What I meant was, the ones you asked for are here.
attributes.name: Apostolic Knight

attributes.content: Please come in, my children.
attributes.name: The Pope

attributes.content: Salutations, Your Holiness...
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: Good day, Your Holiness. I am Cecelia.
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: Ah, welcome. You'll have to forgive me for the mess here.
attributes.name: The Pope

attributes.content: As for you two...
attributes.name: The Pope

attributes.content: What sweets do you like with tea?
attributes.name: The Pope

attributes.content: Do you... need me to make something?
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: Hmm, let me think...
attributes.name: The Pope

attributes.content: Maybe add a few cubes of sugar into your teacup?
attributes.name: The Pope

attributes.content: Ezell, perhaps you should add a few more. Some sweetness will mellow out your nerves.
attributes.name: The Pope

attributes.content: Ah! Y-Yes...
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: Your Holiness, if I... wanted to leave Laterano, would you let me go?
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: If I said no, would you obey me?
attributes.name: The Pope

attributes.content: Maybe not.
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: Then go.
attributes.name: The Pope

attributes.content: ...Your Holiness?
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: I'm just a poor old man whose greatest wish is to spend the rest of his life in a soft rocking chair. How could I muster the effort to manage a young girl's travel plans?
attributes.name: The Pope

attributes.content: But, Cecelia is...
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: Is what? Do you still think she's some hybrid of angel and devil, a saint who will usher in the Revelation?
attributes.name: The Pope

attributes.content: Cecelia is just a little girl who wants to go outside and see the world, is she not?
attributes.name: The Pope

attributes.content: You're still carrying your mama's guardian gun, right?
attributes.name: The Pope

attributes.content: Ah, I'm sorry! Should I leave it with Mister Ezell?
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: But...
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: It's fine, my child.
attributes.name: The Pope

attributes.content: The acquisition of a patron firearm is a solemn affair. It is supposed to require a grand ceremony, the presence of a guardian, the approval of a mentor, as well as lots of troublesome paperwork...
attributes.name: The Pope

attributes.content: But, you aren't even of age to obtain a guardian gun. So, just take it with you quietly.
attributes.name: The Pope

attributes.content: Is that really okay?
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: I wouldn't dare say call this my boon to you. Each and every gun is a valuable asset to Laterano.
attributes.name: The Pope

attributes.content: But, if this is the only keepsake a child has of her mother, I'm sure no one could oppose that.
attributes.name: The Pope

attributes.content: Take it with you, my child. You may not have the physical ability to pull the trigger and take out a bad guy... but it will always remind you that wherever you go, your journey began in Laterano.
attributes.name: The Pope

attributes.content: ...Okay, thank you, Your Holiness.
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: Ezell, go with her. Call it your long-term field mission.
attributes.name: The Pope

attributes.content: Just remember to stop by every now and then.
attributes.name: The Pope

attributes.content: Do I... really have the right to do that?
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: Of course you do. Is this not the choice that you made?
attributes.name: The Pope

attributes.content: I will do everything in my power to fulfill this mission.
attributes.name: Ezell

attributes.content: Look after Cecelia well.
attributes.name: The Pope

attributes.content: Alright, now be on your way. Time waits for no man. When you get to be my age, all you think about is taking your next nap.
attributes.name: The Pope

attributes.content: Mister Pope...
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: I promise to follow this path to the very end.
attributes.name: Cecelia

attributes.content: Oh?
attributes.name: The Pope

attributes.content: In that case, I will pray for you.
attributes.name: The Pope

attributes.content: Your Holiness, are you satisfied with this outcome?
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: I got to enjoy some sweets with them. I am satisfied with that.
attributes.name: The Pope

attributes.content: The man has left, just as you instructed.
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: Should I have kept him around a bit longer? Maybe a piece of chocolate would've cheered him up?
attributes.name: The Pope

attributes.content: Your Holiness... you're too soft-hearted.
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: No, Velliv, the dream of becoming torches in the cold night is doomed to failure. For all of us.
attributes.name: The Pope

attributes.content: But, serving a functionary a hot cup of tea... that's something we can always do.
attributes.name: The Pope

attributes.content: 'This world is hostile to beauty...' May those who reject this aphorism find success.
attributes.name: The Pope

attributes.content: It is time for us to move on to our next task as well. Now that the riots have subsided, let's convene the foreign envoys.
attributes.name: The Pope

attributes.content: The Revelation is clear, I will do what I must.
attributes.name: The Pope

attributes.text: I often think back to what happened that night.
At first, it was just an ordinary cleanup mission, just another group of Sarkaz raiders.
We tracked them down as they made their escape, and came upon the place.
Unusual, but there were no signs of hostility.
Only... traces of those men locked in their own time.
I received that emergency request for aid... I left you.
I abandoned you.
The distress signal wasn't from very far away. The round trip would be half a day at most.
I even rushed back early...
I remember the mottled texture of the tiles under my feet. I remember the sensation of cold rain falling on my face.
I remember your black horns. And your tightly closed eyes.
And Andoain, who had gone missing.
But... it was just a cleanup mission.
It was just another cleanup mission!!!
Why did it have to happen like that? Where did it all go wrong?
If I had never left... If I had stayed there, if I had been with you, would none of that have happened?
At least... At least it wouldn't have been...
That by the time I arrived, everything was set in stone. It couldn't be undone.
It's an awful feeling. Truly, unbearably awful.
That the only thing I could do was watch...
I should've been there to shoulder the burden alongside all of you.

attributes.content: That's not true, Fiammetta. You don't have to shoulder anyone's burden.
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: No, that is my choice.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: I don't care what power he was lusting after, what secrets he was trying to uncover, what answers he was trying to find.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: I don't care about his ideals, his lofty cause, who he redeemed, or who he guided.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: I will not forgive him.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: Not because of my beliefs, not because of Laterano, not because of the Pontifica Cohors, and not even the time that I've lost...
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: I will not forgive him, because––
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: Andoain, you betrayed the people who trusted you.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: My old friends.
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: How come you're here in one piece?
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: How come even His Holiness can't...
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: How come...?
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: How come... you're asking me that again... The path was never there in the first place. What good does it do groping around in the nothingness?
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: Is this your penitence?
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Penitence? No, I have nothing to repent... Where can I repent? There is no light, no path. Those who suffer must continue to suffer, those who grieve must continue to grieve.
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: There is no salvation, no paradise. This is Laterano, and it is the only thing that belongs to us.
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: If the light has always been a lie... No, not a lie... It's real, but not as we wished...
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: There has never been a light... let alone illumination...
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: What are you babbling about, Andoain?
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: Have I given up? Why would I be here if I had given up?
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: With a barrier this thick, how am I supposed to embrace them? How am I supposed to embrace them?
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: Maybe I am nothing more than a swindler peddling false hope... who deceived myself into believing it...
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: I don't understand. What is Its judgment? Where does It want me to go? Its very presence has already blocked my path...
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: Where shall I find my path?
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: Andoain! Wake up! Look who's standing in front of you!
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: Who... Ahh... Fiammetta...
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: Why are you losing your mind again?! Where did your honey tongue go, your righteous air? Have you lost your spine?!
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: How am I supposed to convict a husk of a madman? Take a good look at who's standing in front of you!
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: ...I'm in Laterano, Fiammetta. I'm above the Basilica.
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: I'm glad to see you all again... No, I'm not glad at all.
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: Are you trying to get in the way?
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: You still dare to get in my way?!
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: Apologize, Andoain.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: Right now. Get on your knees and apologize to Mostima and Lemuen!
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: Do you think you did nothing wrong?!
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: I have made countless mistakes.
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: You're still pretty damned smug, aren't you?!
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: God forbid.
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: Listen up, Andoain. I don't give a damn what your beliefs are, nor do I care if all your beliefs have gone to shit.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: Lemuen forgave you. Mostima forgave you. Yvangelista XI forgave you. Even if all of Laterano forgives you... I will not.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: I'm so sorry, Fiammetta.
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: I'm not the one you should be apologizing to.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: If I had the chance, I'd probably do the same thing all over again.
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: Are you for real? You'd say that in front of Fiammetta?
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: And right now, you're not...
attributes.name: Mostima

attributes.content: Very good, Andoain.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: Take out your gun.
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: You know that won't accomplish anything.
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: You think I care about accomplishing something?! I in malam crucem! You think that if I kill you right here, Lemuen gets eight years of her life back?! Or that Mostima gets the whole rest of hers?!
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: Pedicabo ego te et irrumabo! Accomplishing something!
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: I want revenge for the sake of getting my goddamned revenge! Do you get that, Andoain?
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: Are you so completely obsessed, Fiammetta?
attributes.name: Andoain

attributes.content: So what if I am?
attributes.name: Fiammetta

attributes.content: I'll say it one more time, Andoain–– Take out your gun!
attributes.name: Fiammetta
